attributes.action: bring in laws forcing the owners/staff of tropical/marine fish shops to supply the correct information to potential customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people buy fish not knowing if they are compatible with others in a community tank. people buy fish not knowing that many of them grow to more than 10 inches. the fish are then returned to the shop and left in very overstocked tanks to eventually die. we ask that all staff are properly trained to inform the public what type of fish they are buying and how large it will get, the smallest size tank certain fish should be kept in etc.
